segments.text: Mary , I heard you moved again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I could not stand living here . There is always much noise in the neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean noise ? How could it be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , on weekends when we wanted to have late rise in the morning , our neighbour started to raise Cain .
segments.speaker: S2
